text: Du'Vonta Lampkin (January 7, 1997 â€“ May 5, 2022) was an American football defensive tackle. He played college football at Oklahoma. He was born in Houston, Texas. His career lasted from 2018 until 2019. He played offseason with the Tennessee Titans in 2018. Lampkin was shot and killed at his apartment in Dallas, Texas on May 5, 2022 at the age of 25. ==References== Category:1997 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Tennessee Titans players Category:American football defensive tackles Category:Sportspeople from Houston Category:Sportspeople from Dallas Category:Murders by firearm in Texas
title: Du'Vonta Lampkin
